corrected: tatra śrutavān āryaśrāvaka idaṁ pratisaṁśikṣyate: ahaṁ ced evamdṛṣṭiḥ syām evaṁvādī: sarvaṁ me na kṣamata iti, dvābhyāṁ me sārdhaṁ syād vigrahaḥ, syād vivādaḥ | yaś caivaṁdṛṣṭir evaṁvādī: sarvaṁ me kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṁdṛṣṭir evaṁvādi: ekaṁ me kṣamate ekaṁ me na kṣamate iti | vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṁsā, iti sa tāṁ savigrahāṁ savivādāṁ savihiṁsāṁ ca samanupaśyann imāṁ ca dṛṣṭiṁ pratinisṛjati, anyāṁ ca dṛṣṭiṁ nopādatte | evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṁ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ | anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṁdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ ||
